TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It may prevent cancer cells from dividing. It belongs to the family of drugs called cell cycle inhibitors.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer. Podría impedir que las células cancerosas se multipliquen. Es un tipo de inhibidor del ciclo celular.
